name: Minky (Matze1887)
description:
Minky
(Full Version)

Runs on stock Amiga 500 (512k Chip/512k Slow) or better.
Featuring 28 Levels (multidirectional scrolling), each one can be accessed by a password.

Small update 10-10-2022:
- Fixed a levelmap glitch in Level 4
- Fixed endpicture not showing due to a wrong filename :)

Note:
If you use up to 2 external drives on standard Amiga 500 then download the Add21k variant which frees some more Chipram!
